website_summaries.verdict: A super stylish shoe that has the features of a true rugged hiker, the Merrell Moab 2 Earth Day gets overwhelming praises for its out-of-the-box comfort, quality built, and incredible support. But what amazed people more is its versatility. That is - you can wear it around the town after hitting the trails. Another reason to fall in love with this Merrell hiker is the fact that it's eco-friendly. With a grippy Vibram sole made of 30% eco-friendly materials, the Moab 2 Earth Day is as interesting as it sounds.
pros: Lots of Merrell Moab 2 Earth Day reviews rave about how great this shoe is in terms of comfort
It's one sturdy hiker, a handful of people agree
Several people love the versatility these Merrell outdoor shoes offer
Apart from hiking, they use it for work, traveling, and other activities too
A few users have also mentioned about its amazing support
Nearly everyone who reviewed this product is super amazed by its striking looks, most especially the colorful lace loops
It offers excellent grip on rough grounds, says one reviewer
cons: A few customers are dismayed by the high price tag of the Merrell Moab 2 Earth Day hiking shoes

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I find buying shoes a tiresome process as because of the sizes I need. I've returned many as they don't fit as I'd like. THESE, however, fit like a glove! I love them so much and knowing how style will be hard to find months down the road, I've ordered another pair to stick in the wardrobe for when I need to replace my current ones next year.
customer_reviews.author: LP Mines

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these hiking trainers
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing merrell moabs for years because they are an amazing shoe, and this pair of Earth Day design shoe are equally amazing. The price was good, also the delivery was quick and without any damage to to packaging, thanks guys.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I just love Merrell
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for quality made shoes then you should go with Merrell. Comfortable fit and ready for any terrain
customer_reviews.author: Lejacquesnoir

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes well made
customer_reviews.text: Really like these, super comfy and nice leather. One note of caution are sizes. I bought a similar Merrell pair a few weeks previous but they are different size. The style seems to alter their sizing
customer_reviews.author: Mr G

customer_reviews.title: My favourite walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The ventilation has been reduced from my last pair - will see how this works out. I go through about a pair of Moabs a year walking the dog.
customer_reviews.author: A. W. Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Good fit very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have used Merrill shoes before so was confident that they would be a good fit. Other makes of shoe vary in fits ( to big to tight ) Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fitting shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic shoes, being disabled, I need good shoes and these by far are the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Scott  McClements

customer_reviews.title: great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: i do in excess of 15k steps everyday and these are great no problems at all. will buy again when i wear these out if not before!
customer_reviews.author: mr kevin Inkley

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Look good and a good fit. Well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Murray

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit straight out of the box. Very comfortable to wear, even all day! Design looks good with jeans or joggers.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and look good . I can walk all day in these.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Wood

customer_reviews.title: Come up small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 1/2 size bigger as knew this brand come up small, other than that great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shoe but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe...very comfortable and good looking (better on than in the photos) but after 5 months of use and one of the rubber toe protectors have started to crack on one of the shoes. Very annoying so I doubt I'll get a refund. To be honest, I use them A LOT. I do about 25000 steps a day on average walking my dog so they get plenty of use.
customer_reviews.author: Philby

customer_reviews.title: About sizes
customer_reviews.text: Theses boots arrived today. fit is very firm and solid. I am sure they will loosten out. TOP TIP With Merrill, always order the size up from what you are..
customer_reviews.author: treekangar00

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but don't last
customer_reviews.text: Got about 10 months good wear walking the dog, not exactly challenging terrain, and they've split around the toe. Really hoped these would be the shoes to last years based on other reviews but not even 1 year and they're practically useless. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Parkes

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality/material.
customer_reviews.text: The front toe waterproofing gas started to rip and break off in the first 2 months of use. And I know it sounds trivial but the laces keep coming undone. I’ve never had that trouble with any other shoe
customer_reviews.author: Bobwar50

customer_reviews.title: Not up to standard.
customer_reviews.text: A small hole has appeared near toe and I haven't even had them a year. Definitely not waterproof even before the hole appeared!
customer_reviews.author: G. CAMPBELL

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Moab 2 Earth Day Low Rise Hiking Boots
product_meta.description: Made using less water and energy, this hiker provides out of the box comfort for days spent on the trail, without sacrificing durability. Full grain leather upper Bellows tongue to keep debris out breathable mesh lining protective rubber toe cap M select fresh antimicrobial agents reduces shoe odour Merrell air cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability Merrell kinetic fit base removable contoured insole for flexible support recycled compression moulded eva midsole for stability and comfort Moulded nylon arch shank vibram ecodura recycled outsole 5mm lug depth.
feature_bullets: Full Grain Leather Upper- Thick durable leather with water resistant properties.
Bellows Tongue- Locks out debris, moisture, and loose terrain.
Protective Toe Rubber Cap- Protects against rocks and debris.
Breathable Mesh Lining- Creates a damp-free, comfortable environment for your foot to thrive in.
